document.full_text: democrats sharpened their attack on monday against a republican plan to overhaul medicare as they prepared to force their opponents to vote on the unpopular proposal to privatize the health program for the elderly.
document.title: democrats sharpen attack on medicare overhaul
lines_and_colors: democrats sharpened their attack on monday against a republican plan to overhaul medicare as they prepared to force their opponents to vote on the unpopular proposal to privatize the health program for the elderly.
